Class DistributionView

java.lang.Object
DistributionView
public class DistributionView extends Object
A class that is used for extracting out every single aid that has been donated, requested, or distributed

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    DistributionView()
    No-arg constructor
    DistributionView(File donorFile, File ngoFile, File distributedFile)
    Constructs a distributionView object with all the files as its data fields, so that it can be used to updating the database.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    HashMap<String,String>
    buildDonorPhoneNumberMap()
    Builds a hash map that connects the key, Donor Name, to its value, Donor Phonenumber
    HashMap<String,String>
    buildNGOManpowerMap()
    Builds a hash map that connects the key, NGO name, to its value, NGO Manpower
    ArrayList<Distribution>
    getDistributions()
    Returns an ArrayList that contains all the aids that has been distribued
    ArrayList<Distribution>
    getDonations()
    Returns an ArrayList that contains all the donations that has not been distributed to any NGOs
    ArrayList<Distribution>
    getRequests()
    Returns an ArrayList that contains all the requests that has not been met by any Donors
    ArrayList<Distribution>
    viewAllAids()
    Returns an ArrayList that contains all the aids that has been distributed, and all the remaining available donations and incomplete requests

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • DistributionView

      public DistributionView()
      No-arg constructor

    • DistributionView

      public DistributionView(File donorFile, File ngoFile, File distributedFile)
      Constructs a distributionView object with all the files as its data fields, so that it can be used to updating the database.
      Parameters:
      donorFile - the file object of the file that contains all the available donations
      ngoFile - the file object of the file that contains all the incomplete requests
      distributedFile - the file object of the file that contains all the distributed aids

  • Method Details

    • viewAllAids

      public ArrayList<Distribution> viewAllAids()
      Returns an ArrayList that contains all the aids that has been distributed, and all the remaining available donations and incomplete requests
      Returns:
      an ArrayList that contains all the aids that has been donated, requested and distributed

    • getDistributions

      public ArrayList<Distribution> getDistributions()
      Returns an ArrayList that contains all the aids that has been distribued
      Returns:
      an ArrayList that contains all the aids that has been distributed

    • getDonations

      public ArrayList<Distribution> getDonations()
      Returns an ArrayList that contains all the donations that has not been distributed to any NGOs
      Returns:
      an ArrayList that contains all the aids that has been donated

    • getRequests

      public ArrayList<Distribution> getRequests()
      Returns an ArrayList that contains all the requests that has not been met by any Donors
      Returns:
      an ArrayList that contains all the aids that has been requested

    • buildDonorPhoneNumberMap

      public HashMap<String,String> buildDonorPhoneNumberMap()
      Builds a hash map that connects the key, Donor Name, to its value, Donor Phonenumber
      Returns:
      a hash map that maps the donor's phone number to its name

    • buildNGOManpowerMap

      public HashMap<String,String> buildNGOManpowerMap()
      Builds a hash map that connects the key, NGO name, to its value, NGO Manpower
      Returns:
      a hash map that maps the NGO's manpower to its name
